item.title: 25fall Application
item.description:
üéì 25Fall Application Record

üßë‚Äçüéì Background

  • Name: WANG, Feng-Cheng Frankie
  • Major: Mathematics
  • Research Interests: Algebraic Geometry, Mathematical Physics, String Theory
  • Current University: Dalian University of Technology & University of Leicester
  • Academic Background:
    • GPA:
      • Dalian University of Technology: 91.8%
      • University of Leicester: 85.24% (Year 1: 78.17%, Year 2: 84.63%, Year 3: 92.92%)
      • Degree Classification:Expected First Class Honours (University of Leicester, 33% Year 3 + 67% Year 4)
    • Research Experience:
      • Deep learning for solving PDEs (e.g., APReLU + DeepONet)
      • Research on Hurwitz formula upper bounds
  • Language Proficiency:
    • IELTS: None
  • Key Strengths:
    • Strong foundation in Algebra and Geometry
    • Research experience bridging Mathematics and Physics

üóÇÔ∏è Projects
